width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying page width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying page height

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to use if\code{width} or \code{height} are only given as numerics

bg.description: A character value indicating page background color

xgrid.description: A numeric indicating the increment by which to placevertical gridlines

ygrid.description: A numeric indicating the increment by which to placehorizontal gridlines

showGuides.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw ablack border around the entire page and guiding rulers along the top andleft side of the page

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
